sentences.en: a pair of plus fours
sentences.cn: 一条灯笼裤

sentences.en: All vessels were to be built on a cost-plus basis.
sentences.cn: 所有的船只都将在成本加利润的基础上制造。

sentences.en: an income of $50,000 plus
sentences.cn: 五万多美元的收入

sentences.en: Another of the Beach Club’s plus points is that it’s right in the middle of town.
sentences.cn: 海滩俱乐部的另一个优点是它就位于城中心。

sentences.en: Daytime temperatures barely reached plus 5˚.
sentences.cn: 白天的气温仅零上5度。

sentences.en: Experience of any career in sales is a big plus.
sentences.cn: 任何销售领域的工作经验都是一大优势。

sentences.en: He has a sense of humour plus tolerance and patience.
sentences.cn: 他具有幽默感又能宽容和忍耐.

sentences.en: He seems to have mistaken a minus for a plus.
sentences.cn: 他似乎把负号误作正号了.

sentences.en: I charge twenty dollars an hour plus out-of-pocket expenses.
sentences.cn: 我每小时收取20美元，另加垫付的现金开支。

sentences.en: It is $39.95 plus $3 shipping.
sentences.cn: 共39.95美元，外加3美元运费。

sentences.en: Most children start school when they’re five plus.
sentences.cn: 大多数孩子五岁多开始上学。

sentences.en: My salary was around £9,000 plus a car and expenses.
sentences.cn: 我的薪水大约是9,000英镑，还有一辆车和业务经费可支配。

sentences.en: Send a cheque for £18.99 plus £2 for postage and packing.
sentences.cn: 请寄上18.99英镑的支票，外加2英镑的邮资和包装费。

sentences.en: Six months later John had developed literacy and numeracy skills, plus confidence.
sentences.cn: 6个月后，约翰已经渐渐能够识字和算数，也有了自信。

sentences.en: The total cost was $10,000, plus 14% interest.
sentences.cn: 全部费用是1万美元，外加14%的利息。

sentences.en: There are only 35 staff to serve 30,000-plus customers.
sentences.cn: 只有35名员工，却要为3万多顾客服务。

sentences.en: There are plenty of plus points about being an older first-time mum.
sentences.cn: 年龄稍长再做妈妈有很多好处。

sentences.en: This is not an exciting car to drive, but on the plus side it is extremely reliable.
sentences.cn: 这辆车开起来不刺激，不过从好的方面来说它非常可靠。

sentences.en: Three plus six equals nine (3+6=9).
sentences.cn: 3 加6等于9。

sentences.en: Two plus five is seven.
sentences.cn: 二加五等于七。

sentences.en: What's seventeen plus nine?
sentences.cn: 17加9等于 多少 ?

sentences.en: Work out the full weekly rent, plus your rates.
sentences.cn: 算出一周的房租外加房地产税.

phrases.tran_cn: (高尔夫球比赛中强者对弱者的)让一分，让一击

trans.tran_cn: 余，优点的，正数的，多于…的
trans.tran_en: more than zero – used especially when talking about temperatures
used to show that one number or amount is added to another
used to show that one number or amount is added to another
